Pyotr Petrovitch laughed a little at this, but he didn't seem very happy. He was focused on something else, and even Lebeziatnikov noticed it. Pyotr Petrovitch looked excited and rubbed his hands. Lebeziatnikov remembered this and thought about it later.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Luzhin expresses a cynical view on marriage, suggesting he would encourage his wife to take a lover to maintain mutual respect.
